metadata.name: Acella Hydrocortisone Acetate Pramoxine Singles 5 mg 1g Cream

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Propiolactone was used for vaccines tissue grafts surgical instruments and enzymes as a sterilant of blood plasma water milk and nutrient broth as a vapor phase disinfectant in enclosed spaces Its sporicidal action is used against vegetative bacteria pathologic fungi and viruses L1717 It is no longer used in medical procedures or in food A32144

contraindications.disease: Based on experimental trials it has been determined that propiolactone is a human carcinogen The results have shown the generation of tumors in several tissues and from different administration routes A32144
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: When employed under conditions of maximum effectiveness propiolactone is approximately 25 more active as a vapor phase disinfectant than formaldehyde 4000 times more active than ethylene oxide and 50000 times more active than methyl bromide L1718 It has been shown to be mutagenic by inducing cell transformation chromosomal aberrations and chromatoid exchange Propiolactone has been shown to be mutagenic in both somatic and germ cells L1719
